name: Recycling Island
description:
Rid an island and the neighboring waters of trash, and  get rich in the process!

Turn useless garbage into new materials to make new products, hopefully they're reusable this time!

There is no way to actually make products in the game due to lack of time in the jam, but if enough people wanna see it, I'll add it in.

Made in support of #Teamseas using the godot game engine, all music, coding and graphics done by me(except the button prompts, which are from Xelu), sound effects from freesound.org. Enjoy!
